name: Ninja Arena
summary:
Arena of ultimate ninjas and death shinigami in anime world 
 
This game is the most expected android game built via manga in 2018. An excellent arena combat fight game. 
The battle of Shinobi Ninja Village betwwen Soul Society shinigami. 
 
You have 41 character and 20 stage can be choose for your battle, more than 100 skill and ultimate skill. 
Training charka, jutsu, sharingan, chidori and summon support character. 
 
We trust this is the best game you 've played ever. 
 
Ninja Arena Features: 
-Three different game modes: Team VS (arcade and cpu), Single VS (arcade vs cpu), and Practice Training. 
-41 character from anime world for players to choose. 
-14 maps with different scenery help players to change the context in the game. 
-Beautiful graphics close to the comic as well as in the cartoon. 
 
You can combine move with a,b,x,y button to get combo or translate to other type. 
 
Download it for free and enjoy. Thank you !
